name: Flow_SQL_NCR-QC-Database
description: Flow to load data from the SQL server (GTGSQL2) for NCR- and QC-Database.

pbi:mashup.document:

shared NCRstdLieferant = let
  Source = Sql.Database("Degoesql_GTG_QM_NCR-DB", "GTG_QM_NCR-DB"),
  #"Navigation 1" = Source{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "stdLieferant"]}[Data],
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Navigation 1", {"LieferantID", "LieferantNummer", "LieferantName", "Inaktiv"})
in
  #"Choose columns";
shared #"Users NCRs" = let
  Source = Sql.Database("Degoesql_GTG_QM_NCR-DB", "GTG_QM_NCR-DB"),
  #"Navigation 1" = Source{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "Users"]}[Data],
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Navigation 1", {"UserId", "Username", "DisplayName", "Email"})
in
  #"Choose columns";
shared stdNCRStatus = let
  Source = Sql.Database("Degoesql_GTG_QM_NCR-DB", "GTG_QM_NCR-DB"),
  #"Navigation 1" = Source{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "stdNCRStatus"]}[Data],
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Navigation 1", {"NCRStatusID", "StatusBezeichnung", "SortOrder", "Kommentar", "NCRAbgeschlossen"})
in
  #"Choose columns";
shared QCdatIssue = let
  Source = Sql.Databases("Degoesql_GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"),
  #"GTG_Ops_TQC-DB" = Source{[Name = "GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"]}[Data],
  dbo_datIssue = #"GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "datIssue"]}[Data],
  #"Expanded Users(CreatorID)" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(dbo_datIssue, "Users(CreatorID)", {"DisplayName"}, {"Creator"}),
  #"Expanded Users(OwnerID)" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Expanded Users(CreatorID)", "Users(OwnerID)", {"DisplayName"}, {"Owner"}),
  #"Expanded stdBaseFactor" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Expanded Users(OwnerID)", "stdBaseFactor", {"BaseFactor"}, {"BaseFactor"}),
  #"Expanded stdEffect" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Expanded stdBaseFactor", "stdEffect", {"Effect"}, {"Effect"}),
  #"Expanded stdIssueStatus" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Expanded stdEffect", "stdIssueStatus", {"IssueStatus"}, {"IssueStatus"}),
  #"Expanded stdQualityCircle" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Expanded stdIssueStatus", "stdQualityCircle", {"QualityCircle", "Users"}, {"QualityCircle", "Users"}),
  #"Expanded Users" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Expanded stdQualityCircle", "Users", {"DisplayName"}, {"DisplayName"}),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Expanded Users", {{"DisplayName", "ResponsibleQC"}}),
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Renamed columns", {"IssueID", "LastUpdate", "LastUpdateUser", "DateCreated", "TitleShort", "IssueDescription", "ProductType", "PN", "NCRNo", "Comment", "IssueCompleted", "TimeToSolve", "TaskForce", "BaseFactorLevel", "EffectLevel", "CommentChangePrio", "AenderungNummer", "TotalRisk", "Creator", "Owner", "BaseFactor", "Effect", "IssueStatus", "QualityCircle", "ResponsibleQC"})
in
  #"Choose columns";
shared QCdatAction = let
  Source = Sql.Databases("Degoesql_GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"),
  #"GTG_Ops_TQC-DB" = Source{[Name = "GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"]}[Data],
  dbo_datAction = #"GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "datAction"]}[Data],
  #"Expanded Users" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(dbo_datAction, "Users", {"DisplayName"}, {"CreatorName"}),
  #"Expanded stdActionClass" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Expanded Users", "stdActionClass", {"ActionClass", "ActionClassDE", "ActionClassLevel"}, {"ActionClass", "ActionClassDE", "ActionClassLevel"}),
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Expanded stdActionClass", {"ActionID", "IssueID", "Action", "DateCreated", "DateClosed", "DueDate", "LastUpdate", "RootCauseAnalysis", "Reason", "ActionNo", "ActionPriority", "CreatorName", "ActionClass", "ActionClassDE", "ActionClassLevel"})
in
  #"Choose columns";
shared QCdatActionTask = let
  Source = Sql.Databases("Degoesql_GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"),
  #"GTG_Ops_TQC-DB" = Source{[Name = "GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"]}[Data],
  dbo_datActionTask = #"GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "datActionTask"]}[Data],

  #"Expanded datAction" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Expanded Users", "datAction", {"IssueID"}, {"datAction.IssueID"}),
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Expanded datAction", {"ActionTaskID", "ActionID", "DueDate", "Task", "Result", "TaskClosed", "TaskNo", "Responsible", "datAction.IssueID"})
in
  #"Choose columns";
shared #"Users QCs" = let
  Source = Sql.Databases("Degoesql_GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"),
  #"GTG_Ops_TQC-DB" = Source{[Name = "GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"]}[Data],
  dbo_Users = #"GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "Users"]}[Data],
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(dbo_Users, {"UserId", "Username"})
in

shared stdBaseFactor = let
  Source = Sql.Databases("Degoesql_GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"),
  #"GTG_Ops_TQC-DB" = Source{[Name = "GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"]}[Data],
  dbo_stdBaseFactor = #"GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "stdBaseFactor"]}[Data]
in
  dbo_stdBaseFactor;
shared stdEffect = let
  Source = Sql.Databases("Degoesql_GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"),
  #"GTG_Ops_TQC-DB" = Source{[Name = "GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"]}[Data],
  dbo_stdEffect = #"GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "stdEffect"]}[Data]

shared stdIssueStatus = let
  Source = Sql.Databases("Degoesql_GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"),

shared stdQualityCircle = let
  Source = Sql.Databases("Degoesql_GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"),
  #"GTG_Ops_TQC-DB" = Source{[Name = "GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"]}[Data],
  dbo_stdQualityCircle = #"GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "stdQualityCircle"]}[Data],
  #"Expanded Users" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(dbo_stdQualityCircle, "Users", {"DisplayName"}, {"DisplayName"}),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Expanded Users", {{"DisplayName", "Responsible"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared stdActionClass = let
  Source = Sql.Databases("Degoesql_GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"),
  #"GTG_Ops_TQC-DB" = Source{[Name = "GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"]}[Data],
  dbo_stdActionClass = #"GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "stdActionClass"]}[Data]
in
  dbo_stdActionClass;
shared stdDropDown = let
  Source = Sql.Databases("Degoesql_GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"),
  #"GTG_Ops_TQC-DB" = Source{[Name = "GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"]}[Data],
  dbo_stdDropDown = #"GTG_Ops_TQC-DB"{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "stdDropDown"]}[Data]
in
  dbo_stdDropDown;
shared #"Users_NCR-QC" = let
  Source = Table.NestedJoin(#"Users QCs", {"Username"}, #"Users NCRs", {"Username"}, "Users NCRs", JoinKind.LeftOuter),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"UserId", "UserId_QC"}}),
  #"Expanded Users NCRs" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Renamed columns", "Users NCRs", {"UserId", "DisplayName", "Email"}, {"Users NCRs.UserId", "Users NCRs.DisplayName", "Users NCRs.Email"})
in
  #"Expanded Users NCRs";
